Slide Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Generic»GObject»Control»Numeric»NumericWithScale. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Fill ColorColor to use to fill in the active slider. Details
Fill StyleFill style for active slider: 0-None, 1-To min, 2-To max, 3-To value below, 4-To value above. Details
ScaleReference to the slide scale object. Details
